title: Comparison
verses: Galatians 6:4–5 (WEB) — “Let each man prove his own work… for each man will bear his own burden.”
2 Corinthians 10:12 (WEB) — “…comparing themselves with themselves, are without understanding.”
Psalm 139:14 (WEB) — “I am fearfully and wonderfully made.”
Philippians 2:3–4 (WEB) — “In humility count others better than yourselves… look also to the things of others.”
body: Comparison shrinks joy and stirs pride or shame. Receive your life as a gift from God; steward it faithfully. Celebrate others’ grace, and focus on your assignment today.
prayer: Father, free me from envy and pride. Teach me contentment and gratitude. Help me rejoice in others’ good and be faithful with what You’ve given me. Amen.
